name: GeniusMath
0:
”Alexa, open genius math”
”Start training”
”Start a contest”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: genius math
des: Genius: Math is a math training game with a focus on elementary math skills such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. It supports a solo training mode for kids to work on their math skills as well as a competitive mode for multiple players.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
